name: Mini Mafia (Vidnyani10)
description:
MiniMafia is a simple 2D platformer game I made for fun and to enhance my skills.

How to play:

  • Right arrow key or D to move forward.
  • Left arrow key or A to move backward.
  • Spacebar for jump.
  • Left button of mouse to kill enemies.

Collect coins and kill red Goobers in order to increase your score.

Watch out for streams and TNT boxes as well!!

Feedbacks are appreciated.

Thank you!
